message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive introductory price of $99. This limited-time offer won't last long, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm unable to match the $80 price point. I would like to counter with an offer of $95. I hope this works better for you.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $85? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway between $80 and $95.
